resources.string:
An Android client for Yarra Trams tramTRACKER® Web Service.

Follow @tram_hunter on Twitter for latest updates.

Latest Changes in v0.8.2
 - Added route selector for stops with >1 route
 - Minor fix for stops with a 'Special Event'

Latest Changes in v0.8.1
 - Fixed 'Favourite Stops' on open problem

Latest Changes in v0.8
 - Force Close fix for some devices
 - Special Event message now an OK dialog
 - Fix for Network Map force close (Out of Memory)

Latest Changes in v0.7
 - New home screen with icons
 - Action bar for each activity
 - Nice high-res icons for HDPI devices
 - Android 1.5 fixes
 - Small screen device support (e.g. HTC Wildfire)
 - App2SD Support
 - Application wide search button support
 - Tram Network Map
 - Better Stop map marker
 - My Location button for map
 - Fixes for location
 - Searching for TramTracker ID now done in general search

Please file bug reports and feature requests at the Tram Hunter project website at:
http://tramhunter.googlecode.com

For Terms of Use of the tramTRACKER® Web Service, see:
